name: 3rd Edition of Euro-Global Conference on Biotechnology and Bioengineering
content: Based on the success of ECBB 2022, Magnus Group is ecstatic to announce its “3rd Edition of Euro-Global Conference on Biotechnology and Bioengineering” (ECBB 2023) which will be conducted in a hybrid format during June 14-15, 2023 at Rome, Italy. The global summit will be focused on the theme “Revealing and Transforming the Globe with Innovations in Biotechnology and Bioengineering” with the goal of unlocking new possibilities in the field of biotechnology and bioengineering. It serves as an annual gathering for biotechnologists, scientists, researchers, engineers, healthcare practitioners, industry representatives and scholars to present their research findings and findings in all fields of Biological Science and Technology, particularly Bioengineering and Biotechnology, Animal and Plant Biotechnology, Microbial Biotechnology, Genetic Engineering, Biomedical Engineering, Biopharmaceuticals and Pharmacology, and other related topics. The two-day worldwide consortium allows participants to examine the evolving landscape and future of Biotechnology and Bioengineering, as well as take a deeper dive into the most recent breakthroughs and trends. The scientific gathering allows you to hear from subject matter experts who will address technological, logistical, and regulatory obstacles and solutions. During the congress’s networking session, participants will have the opportunity to interact with industry leaders and colleagues. We hope you have valuable professional development at ECBB 2023\.
